original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma

original: 20.9. Saraṇaduka
analyzed: saraṇaduka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na araṇam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam ca na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Paccanīya
analyzed: paccanīya

original: Nahetu
analyzed: na hetu

original: Nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā na araṇam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati na hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca …pe… napurejāte cattāri …pe… nakamme dve …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetuyā dve na ārammaṇe tīṇi na adhipatiyā pañca pe na purejāte cattāri pe na kamme dve pe na āhāre na indriye na jhāne na magge ekam pe na vippayutte dve pe no vigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa
analyzed: na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ saraṇassa

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa

original: hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ dve

original: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ dve

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe cattāri ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca anantare cattāri

original: …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte
analyzed: pe sahajāte pañca aññamaññe dve nissaye satta upanissaye cattāri purejāte pacchājāte

original: āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte
analyzed: āsevane dve kamme cattāri vipāke eka āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri sampayutte

original: dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta.
analyzed: dve vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate satta

original: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta …pe… nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye pañca …pe… napurejāte cha …pe… nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri …pe… noavigate cattāri.
analyzed: na hetuyā satta na ārammaṇe satta pe na sahajāte na aññamaññe na nissaye pañca pe na purejāte cha pe na sampayutte pañca na vippayutte cattāri pe no avigate cattāri

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitaḥ evam gaṇetabba
